text: Tomáš Rosický (; born 4 October 1980) is a Czech former professional footballer who was the captain of the Czech Republic national team for ten years. He played club football for Sparta Prague, Borussia Dortmund and Arsenal. Currently, he serves at the sports director of AC Sparta Prague. == Career statistics == === Club === Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League Cup League Cup
